law.catch_line: The account that the Comptroller keeps for the Treasurer shall:...
law.text:
The account that the Comptroller keeps for the Treasurer shall:
charge the Treasurer with:
the money that is in the State Treasury when a fiscal year begins; and
money that, on warrant, is paid into the State Treasury during the fiscal year; and
credit the Treasurer with money that, on warrant, is paid from the State Treasury.
